title: 37. Bowl of the Sun
content: In a massive pothole carved over the centuries into the red-hued rock, someone has built a flourishing garden. Pipes, presumably carrying water, lead to and from the pothole and to smaller potholes on the periphery, each also growing carefully cultivated varieties of foliage. It's as if this sunkissed plateau housed a living lexicon of every plant in the Valley and beyond.
